item.title: About Me
item.description: Education: Cornell University (2020-2024) Grade: Senior Major: Computer Science and Operations Research Hometown: Shanghai, China

item.title: Experiences
item.description: TA Experiences: Teaching assistant for CS1110 (FA22, SP23, SP24), CS4410 (FA23), AEW Facilitator for CS1110 (SP22), , CS 3110 (FA220, CS2110 (SP23) Past Courseworks: Computer Vision, Algorithms, Advanced Database System, Machine Learning, Operating Systems,Embedded Systems, Robotics Foundations, Object-Oriented/Functional Programming, Stochastic Process, Optimization Programming Languages: Python, Java, C/C++, SQL, OCaml, R, JavaScript Internship Experiences: Software Engineer Intern at Amazon (Summer 2024) Audit Intern at Ernst & Young (Summer 2023)

item.title: Others
item.description: In my free time, I enjoy playing the piano and reading books. I also love traveling and exploring different categories of food from all over the world.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Ultimate Tic Tac Toe with AI Models (Python) • Software engineered a dynamic Ultimate Tic Tac Toe with multiple artificial intelligence opponents. • Implemented machine learning algorithms and enabled game simulations between multiple AI models. • Successfully trained and evaluated AI models to achieve a maximum of 72% winning rate. Gender Disparities in Corporations (Python) • Software engineered a simulation model studying the gender ratio of employees in each level after certain number of years.
